newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy cities' preliminary CPI data due next week.
newsitem.headline: Italy cities' preliminary CPI data due next week.

text.p: Preliminary April consumer price inflation data from 11 Italian cities will be released next Monday and Tuesday, April 21 and 22, national statistics institute Istat announced.

Istat said Milan, Turin, Venice, Trieste, Naples and Bari will release their CPI figures on Monday. Genoa, Bologna, Florence, Perugia and Palermo will issue their data on Tuesday. The figures will be released at 1530 GMT on both days.
Istat wil publish the final national April CPI data at 0700 GMT on May 6.
